checks.message: All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'dataType' field being populated with 'Submitted Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: 'test_rg_3.bam'.
SM in BAM header does not match submitterSampleId in metadata JSON: HCC1143 vs HCC1143T
